body:
### What to do next

Use this form to tell the court whether or not you support this application.

You should complete this form within 14 days from the day you were told about the application.

It usually takes about 5 minutes.
heading: Respond to a property and financial affairs application
lede: A person you know has applied to the Court of Protection to make property and financial decisions on someone's behalf - to be their deputy.
